description: D3.js-based line chart component with multiple series support, interactive tooltips, zoom and pan capabilities, time-series support, and customizable axes and scales

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Chart data containing one or more series of data points

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: Chart configuration options (dimensions, axes, tooltips, zoom, etc.)

outputs.name: pointClick
outputs.description: Emitted when a data point is clicked

outputs.name: pointHover
outputs.description: Emitted when a data point is hovered

outputs.name: zoomChange
outputs.description: Emitted when zoom or pan state changes

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: Emitted when an error occurs during chart rendering or interaction

publicMethods.name: resetZoom
publicMethods.description: Resets the chart zoom to show all data
publicMethods.sideEffects: Updates chart zoom state and triggers re-render

publicMethods.name: updateData
publicMethods.sideEffects: Triggers chart re-render with new data

publicMethods.name: updateConfig

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Partial configuration to merge with existing config

publicMethods.sideEffects: Triggers chart re-render with new configuration

publicMethods.name: exportChart
publicMethods.description: Exports chart as image (PNG or SVG)
Returns data URL of exported image

lifecycleHooks.name: ngOnInit
lifecycleHooks.description: Initializes chart, creates D3 scales and axes

lifecycleHooks.name: ngOnChanges
lifecycleHooks.description: Handles input changes, triggers chart updates

lifecycleHooks.name: ngOnDestroy
lifecycleHooks.description: Cleans up D3 selections and event listeners

accessibility.ariaDescription: Interactive line chart with zoom and pan capabilities
